issue.title: npm packages census
issue.body:
After a quick look, we have 58 npm packages shared across 3 organisation (`@celo`, `@celo-tools`, `@clabs`).
We need to investigate and summarize what's up with that. Which ones are up-to-date, deprecated, abandoned, etc.

comment.body:
@shazarre wrote a neat script that fetches NPM package metadata via an API. 
He had a lovely Google Sheet with the output. 

Next step is:
- linking the sheet here (at minimum), copy/pasting a bullet list of the packages here for reference (at best)
- reviewing packages e.g. 
  - which do we (@celo-org/devtooling) want to maintain, which do we (@celo-org/devtooling) want to deprecate
  - which do we want to bring to other team's attention (so they decide on maintenance/deprecation)

comment.body:
```suggestion
/packages/env-tests/ @celo-org/primitives
```

I suggest env-test is owned by the primitive team.
See this [Slack](https://celo-org.slack.com/archives/C9RSRC8KS/p1696860716280309?thread_ts=1696860617.336019&cid=C9RSRC8KS) thread where we asked what it's about.

issue.title: Auto-Prereleasing Strategies
issue.body:
Where as releasing main versions of packages is simple with Changesets, pre releasing requires a different strategy. 


## Snapshot release
* create an action to release snapshots of packages automatically whenever the changeset version packages pr is updated. 
* install these packages in ci action to ensure all is well 


## Beta Release
* decide on if a more formal beta release process that runs on CI is needed. or if snapshots will be sufficient.

comment.body:
###  ⚠️  No Changeset found

Latest commit: 61b684b0bb7ec435a359c1af2960aa7e75729022

Merging this PR will not cause a version bump for any packages. If these changes should not result in a new version, you're good to go. **If these changes should result in a version bump, you need to add a changeset.**

<details><summary>This PR includes no changesets</summary>

  When changesets are added to this PR, you'll see the packages that this PR includes changesets for and the associated semver types

</details>

[Click here to learn what changesets are, and how to add one](https://github.com/changesets/changesets/blob/main/docs/adding-a-changeset.md).

[Click here if you're a maintainer who wants to add a changeset to this PR](https://github.com/celo-org/celo-monorepo/new/lvpeschke/rename-devtooling?filename=.changeset/tame-lions-rest.md&value=---%0A%0A---%0A%0As%2Fapplications%2Fdevtooling%2Fg%0A)
